outputs.output_descr: Youth civic engagement will be facilitated through implementation of three inter-related activities: youth needs assessment;  trainings and discussions and youth forums at regional level; The assessment methodology will be prepared at the initial stage, and peer educators trained, which will be followed by individual information-gathering activities by peer educators. The information gathered by peer educators will be discussed at the training sessions which are planned to take at sub-regional levels, and the final results of the needs and issues identified would be presented at the regional-level Youth Forums.  Special attention will be paid to the inclusion of disadvantaged youth, so that their needs are also reflected in the assessment, and they are also given opportunity to participate in discussions and training sessions.

Youth civic engagement will be facilitated through implementation of three inter-related activities: youth needs assessment;  trainings and discussions and youth forums at regional level; The assessment methodology will be prepared at the initial stage, and peer educators trained, which will be followed by individual information-gathering activities by peer educators. The information gathered by peer educators will be discussed at the training sessions which are planned to take at sub-regional levels, and the final results of the needs and issues identified would be presented at the regional-level Youth Forums.  Special attention will be paid to the inclusion of disadvantaged youth, so that their needs are also reflected in the assessment, and they are also given opportunity to participate in discussions and training sessions.

project_descr: The project is supporting the development of the sustainable civil society in Georgia through youth-related activities.
